Headline: #3 King Drive Temporary Reroute at King Drive/76th
ShortDescription: 3 King Drive buses temp. rerouted NB: King Drive, 76th, Eberhart, 75th, and King Drive;  SB: King Drive, 75th, Vernon, 76th, and King Drive nr King Drive/76th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Northbound buses will operate via King Drive, 76th, Eberhart, 75th, and King Drive.

Southbound buses will operate via King Drive, 75th, Vernon, 76th, and King Drive.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed near 95th
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing near 95th due to an unauthorized person on the tracks near 95th. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing near 95th due to an unauthorized person on the tracks near 95th.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, #29 State route or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
